nra.gloss: a powerful lobby that advocates the right to own and bear arms and rejects any gun regulation by the government

nrc.gloss: an independent federal agency created in 1974 to license and regulate nuclear power plants

nrem.gloss: a recurring sleep state during which rapid eye movements do not occur and dreaming does not occur

nrem sleep.gloss: a recurring sleep state during which rapid eye movements do not occur and dreaming does not occur

nrl.gloss: the United States Navy's defense laboratory that conducts basic and applied research for the Navy in a variety of scientific and technical disciplines

nrna.gloss: ribonucleic acid found in the nucleolus of the cell

nro.gloss: an intelligence agency in the United States Department of Defense that designs and builds and operates space reconnaissance systems to detect trouble spots worldwide and to monitor arms control agreements and environmental issues and to help plan military operations

nrti.gloss: an antiviral drug used against HIV
